Mabuk Miras, 3 Pemuda di Bone Perkosa Gadis ABG di Sawah
02 Nov 2019, 11:57 by Zulkipli Natsir
Bone - Bejat nian kelakukan Andi Arham alias Aan Bin Andi Faisal, Ismail alias Mail Bin Nasi dan Mustakar alias Kaka Bin Sanawing. Ketiganya ditangkap polisi setelah diduga memperkosa secara bergilir perempuan ABG di sawah.
Peristiwa ini dilaporkan keluarga korban pada Sabtu (2 /10/19) sekitar pukul 02.00 wita. Kemudian, polisi lalu menangkap satu persatu pelaku sekitar pukul 03.00 dinihari.
"Usai mendapat laporan dari korban, kami langsung bertindak cepat dengan menangkap 3 orang pelaku di kediamannya. Kini, kami amankan ketiga pelaku dan sementara masih dalam proses penyelidikan," ungak Kapolsek Sibulue, Iptu Arif Supu.
Menurut dia, para pelaku diduga melakukan tindak kekerasan seksual ini lantaran terpengaruh minuman keras. "Kami periksa pelaku ternyata mereka habis menenggak miras jenis ballo. Kami masih melakukan pengembangan atas dugaan adanya keterlibatan pelaku lainnya," ujar Arif.
Arif menceritakan kasus ini berawal saat para pelaku menghentikan laju sepeda motor korban di tengah jalan. Kemudian para pelaku menarik secara paksa tangan korban ke tengah sawah. Selain memperkosa korban, sebelumnya pelaku melakukan tindak kekerasan dengan memukul dan menendang korban hingga korban tidak lagi mampu melawan.
Keluarga korban meminta para pelaku dihukum seberat-beratnya.

Drunk Miras, 3 Youths in Bone Rape ABG Girls in the Rice Fields
02 Nov 2019, 11:57 by Zulkipli Natsir
Bone - The depraved behavior of Andi Arham alias Aan Bin Andi Faisal, Ismail aka Mail Bin Nasi and Mustakar alias Kaka Bin Sanawing. The three were arrested by police after allegedly raping ABG women in turns in the fields.
This incident was reported by the victim's family on Saturday (2/10/10) at around 2:00 a.m. Then, the police then arrested one of the perpetrators at around 3:00 in the morning.
"After receiving a report from the victim, we immediately acted quickly by arresting 3 perpetrators in his residence. Now, we secure the three perpetrators and while still in the process of investigation," said Sibulue Police Chief, Iptu Arif Supu.
According to him, the perpetrators allegedly committed sexual violence because of this being influenced by liquor. "We checked the perpetrators turned out they had drunk the type of ballo liquor. We are still developing on suspicion of the involvement of other actors," Arif said.
Arif said that the case began when the perpetrators stopped the victim's motorcycle in the middle of the road. Then the perpetrators pulled the victim's hand by force into the middle of the rice field. In addition to raping victims, the perpetrators previously committed acts of violence by beating and kicking victims so that victims were no longer able to fight.
The victim's family asked that the perpetrators be severely punished.
